name: A320 Checklist
description:
The A320 Checklist app brings paperless checklists straight to your palm. Checklists are complete for standard operations of an A320 series aircraft. This app is ideally suited for pilots flying on Flight Simulators at home, especially for Flight Simulator add-ons such as Aerosoft Airbus.

Features:

- A320 standard operating checklists
- Very easy and intuitive user interface
- Simple checkmarking system to mark completed items
- Now you can use the app in landscape & horizontal
- Fully optimised for all iPhones
- iPad compatible

*** This app is for entertainment purposes only! We are not affiliated with Airbus or any airline ***
